title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs sentenced to 50 months in prison and a $500,000 fine
subhead: Combs was acquitted by a jury in July of the most serious charges against him – sex trafficking and racketeering – but convicted of two counts of transporting people across state lines for prostitution.

title: French companies worry about the effects of a 'major global upheaval' created by Trump's tariffs
subhead: Declining exports and uncertainty about supply chains: Various industrial sectors have been hit by the shifting trade tariffs implemented by the United States. Many fear further disruption may lie ahead.

title: Thomas Piketty: 'If Europe does not urgently give up its love of free trade, it risks an unprecedented social and industrial disaster'
subhead: Europe should impose tariffs as a sort of tax on the CO₂ generated by the transportation of goods and to counter the damaging effects of Chinese dumping, writes the French economist.

subhead: Cathy M., the then partner of Delphine Jubillar's lover, found out about their relationship before Jubillar disappeared. Before the court, Cathy M., who was quickly written off as a suspect, had to explain the messages she sent to her rival.

title: Manchester synagogue attack leaves British Jewish community in shock
subhead: Two people were killed and four injured in an attack at Heaton Park synagogue in Manchester on Thursday, during Yom Kippur celebrations. The assailant, shot dead by police, was called a terrorist by authorities.

title: Trump's tariff war persists, destabilizing global trade
subhead: Six months ago, on April 2, the president of the United States unveiled his 'reciprocal tariffs' on the rest of the world. Since then, Washington has wielded the threat of new taxes to pressure its partners.
